channel.title: AzRoleWatcher
channel.description: Continuously monitor roles and permissions in Microsoft Entra ID and Azure.

item.title: üÜï ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 42f3c60f-e7b1-46d7-ba56-6de681664342
Display name: Azure Red Hat OpenShift First Party Network
Description: Grant ARO Classic First Party Service Principal or managed identity required network permissions.
Link: https://management.azure.com/42f3c60f-e7b1-46d7-ba56-6de681664342?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: üÜï ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: c883944f-8b7b-4483-af10-35834be79c4a
Display name: Azure AI Owner
Description: Grants full to manage AI project and accounts. Grants reader access to AI projects, reader access to AI accounts, and data actions for an AI project.
Link: https://management.azure.com/c883944f-8b7b-4483-af10-35834be79c4a?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ‚ùå REMOVED Azure role
item.description:
Id: cc27d9db-08f8-4bdf-81a8-d03bb8db2dd9
Display name: Defender for AI Threat Protection Purview Operator
Description: Service role that provides permissions for Microsoft Defender for AI Threat Protection to work with Purview service
Link: https://management.azure.com/cc27d9db-08f8-4bdf-81a8-d03bb8db2dd9?api-version=2022-04-01
